effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 591,392 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 269,089.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 7,187 for 15 sec.

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 387 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 65,363 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 148,560.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
